message.name: OPENHD_SYSTEM_TELEMETRY
message.description: Used for ground/air system load,current,and more

message.name: OPENHD_WIFIBROADCAST_STATISTICS
message.description: Wifibroadcast statistics for a uniqe WB stream
message.field: the unique stream ID this data refers to

message.name: OPENHD_LOG_MESSAGE
message.description: Log message for internal Open.HD components
message.field: severity level, relies on the definitions within RFC-5424.
status message, 49 character max length since it *must* be null-terminated
timestamp when message was originally generated

message.name: OPENHD_VERSION_MESSAGE
message.description: The current Open.HD version running on the system sending the message
message.field: version string, 29 character max length since it *must* be null-terminated
